attributes.action: The govt should fund De La Salle Cricket Club to paint the new scoring hut.
attributes.additional_details:
The govt now has £350 million to spare post Brexit. Just £100 could help us purchase enough pots of green and gold paint. The addition of the paint would help De La Salle to become one of the top 145 most picturesque cricket grounds in Sheffield. 

This is a wonderful opportunity for the government to show it cares. 

Come on government - it makes sense.
attributes.background: De La Salle Cricket Club is one of the 150 most picturesque cricket clubs in Sheffield. Our new scoring hut is beautiful but it is unpainted. The govt should fund De La Salle to purchase Green and Gold paint to make our new scoring hut marvellous. Please support making our scoring hut more lovely.
